npc_output: Not much, just trying to stay warm on a cold snowy night like this. Perhaps you could help me with |r2|?
Actually, I was hoping someone could assist me with |r5|. This hail is making it difficult to navigate.
It's definitely lively! I'm thinking of performing |r9| later. Care to join me?

Freezing! I was thinking of getting some warmer clothes, maybe getting |r2| done.

Just trying out some new recipes. Maybe I'll try |r3| later, if the wind dies down.
